message: Starting review of Coordination Enhancement phase - examining workspace and agent findings
Reviewing Phase 2 work: coordination_enhancer and response_designer completed their tasks successfully. Examining the implementation details.
Verified new coordination.py module created with 641 lines. Checking test file to verify functionality works correctly.
Verified enhancement working: 5x more visibility (15 findings vs 3). Now checking integration in update_agent_progress and report_agent_finding functions.
Confirmed integration: Both update_agent_progress and report_agent_finding now use get_comprehensive_coordination_info. Conducting final security and quality review.
Review complete and verdict submitted: APPROVED. Phase 2 successfully enhanced coordination with 5x more peer visibility. Work advanced to Phase 3: Health Monitoring.
